fr.enac.parser

Class Preprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.enac.parser.Preprocessor

  • public class Preprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Preprocessor is the class used to manage all operations on all SSML file

      void replaceNumbers(org.w3c.dom.Document docXml)

        Parameters:
        flightParameters - The array containing all the parameters of a specific flight
        orderParameters - The array containing all the parameters of an order to a specific flight

      • printDocument

        public static void printDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                 java.io.OutputStream out)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Print a document to the specified output
        Parameters:
        doc - The document to print
        out - The OutputStream where to print the document. Use System.out to write on the console or new FileOutputStream("pathToFile") to write on a file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • getEnvironment

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEnvironment()
        Getter of the environment attribute
        Returns:
        The environment (= all flight and order parameter) used by the preprocessor

      • evalHashTable

        public void evalHashTable(javax.script.ScriptEngine engine,
                          java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hashtable)
        Creates variables inside the ScriptEngine corresponding to the keys and values of the dictionary.
        Parameters:
        engine - ScriptEngine where to declare variables
        hashtable - Dictionary containing name of variables and values to be assigned

      • replaceValues

        public void replaceValues(org.w3c.dom.Document docXml,
                          java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hashtable)
        Replaces all 'value' marker with the value associated to the key of the 'expr' attribute of the marker. For example, if the dictionary has an entry which associate Speed -> 180, the marker "" will be replaced by "180".
        Parameters:
        docXml - the XML document
        hashtable - the dictionary of all environment variables

      • replaceNumbers

        public void replaceNumbers(org.w3c.dom.Document docXml)
        Replaces all 'say-as' marker with the number between the markers which each of the digits has been separated by a space For example, the marker "180" will be replaced by "1 8 0".
        Parameters:
        docXml - the XML document

      • replaceConditions

        public void replaceConditions(org.w3c.dom.Document docXml,
                              java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hashtable)
        Replaces all 'if' marker inside the docXml file after performing standard conditional logic. The structure of an if markup should be : 
         
 <if cond="ECMAScript_Expression">
 executable_content
 <elseif cond="ECMAScript_Expression"/> [optional]
 executable_content
 <elseif cond="ECMAScript_Expression"/> [optional]
 executable_content
 <else/> [optional]
 executable_content
 </if>
        Parameters:
        docXml - the XML document
        hashtable - the dictionary of all environment variables

      • convertToSSML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document convertToSSML(java.lang.String fileName)
        Take a file formated in extended SSML and convert it to SSML readable by the AudioPLayer
        Parameters:
        fileName - Path to the file to convert.
